mav_sim.unit_tests.ch2_transforms_tests module¶

Runs a number of fixed unit tests from pickle files for chapter 2 transforms.

class mav_sim.unit_tests.ch2_transforms_tests.SimpleRotationTest¶

Bases: object

Stores a test for the rotation matrix

angle: float¶
output: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶
class mav_sim.unit_tests.ch2_transforms_tests.ThreeRotationTest¶

Bases: object

Stores a test for the rotation matrix with three angles

output: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶
phi: float¶
psi: float¶
theta: float¶

Stores a test for the pose transformation

east: float¶

mav_sim.unit_tests.ch2_transforms_tests.generate_rot_b_to_s_tests(num_tests: int = 100) → list[SimpleRotationTest]¶

Generates a number of rotation matrix tests for rotation from b to s

Generates a number of rotation matrix tests for rotation from b to v

mav_sim.unit_tests.ch2_transforms_tests.generate_tests() → None¶

Generates and saves a pickle file with the randomly generated tests

Generates a number of pose transformation tests from body to inertial frame

Generates a number of pose transformation tests from vehicle to inertial frame

mav_sim.unit_tests.ch2_transforms_tests.run_all_tests() → None¶

Runs each of the auto generated tests
